meanings.definition: Disgusting or unpleasant in taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: The yeuky smell of rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The garbage left in the hot sun became yeuky quickly.
meanings.sent3: The yeuky cafeteria food made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: The yeuky taste lingered in her mouth long after she ate it.
meanings.sent5: The yeuky odor from the dumpster made her hold her nose.

meanings.definition: Feeling or causing an urge to vomit.
meanings.sent1: The yeuky medicine made her feel queasy.
meanings.sent2: The yeuky smell coming from the bathroom was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The yeuky roller coaster ride left her feeling dizzy.
meanings.sent4: The yeuky sight of the spoiled milk made her stomach turn.
meanings.sent5: The yeuky taste of the expired yogurt made her gag.

meanings.definition: Covered in or resembling mucus or slime.
meanings.sent1: The yeuky frog left a trail of slime behind.
meanings.sent2: The yeuky texture of the snail's trail made her shiver.
meanings.sent3: The yeuky substance on the tree branch looked like mucus.
meanings.sent4: The yeuky feeling of the wet mud squishing between her toes was unpleasant.
meanings.sent5: The yeuky appearance of the monster in the movie scared the children.
